Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'I see... It all makes sense now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: '...Why? Why did you do that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'X', 3: "Rawr. Don't mistake it for my intent. I didn't want it this way...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'X', 3: 'This is all... for the "Endless Eight Corridor".', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "That's a weird place for a title drop.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, um. I feel like someone's after our butts so... I'm trying to end it quick... sorta???", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Anyways! Skipping the 2nd OP, again! It'll have to wait until season 2!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: '...Corridor?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'X', 3: 'Indeed. The war for the swimsuits, in the end, is a war to control summer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: 'He who controls the swimsuits, controls summer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: "And the Leviathan you're wearing is the mediator of the three swimsuits. In other words, Leviathan is an essential key to controlling summer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: 'And with Rawr being a super-duper-clever-burger, how can I let those three idiots control summer!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So why give it to me?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'X', 3: 'Whaddya thunk? You think I can wear a swimsuit?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: "Obviously I can't... but the candy-loving lil' Lucia can.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: 'If you promise to stay here forever, you can have the promised candies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: 'Heaps. Mountains. Endless. Candies which endureth unto everlasting life.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Just like your gingerbread man cookies?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'X', 3: "Eh, don't mind the little stuff.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leviathan', 3: "I do feel something similar to what you describe. But I'm not the one calling for the other swimsuits. The other swimsuits are the ones... calling for me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...So what do you want to do? Levi?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'No. What do you, Lucia, want to do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'You have always been true and good to me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'And now, I trust in your decision.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No time to explain! Run! Tons of bad guys are coming after us!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'But... the story...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Run and narrate! Run and narrate! Just run for now!', 4: '2'}
{3: '...And like that, "Lucia" saw through the devious plan of X, or Rawr.'}
{3: 'X sent an army after "Lucia", trying to steal Leviathan back from her.'}
{3: "...But X's troops failed."}
{3: '...Because our "Lucia" is a superhero with both skill and dash!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'COME BACK HERE!!!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory197.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She scaled mountainous heights...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She swam across tempestuous seas...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory189.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Past terrifying depths...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory192.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Through dilapidated ruins...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Sophia and Nanami? What's with the rush?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'AH! NOT THE TIME! OUTTA THE WAY!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "We need to run or we'll be killed.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory194.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Across a mysterious castle in the sky...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh! Don't run! It's dangerous!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Not trusting a word from your mouth, you evil swimsuit guardian!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Not running is very bad.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Swimsuit guardian?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{1: '1', 3: '...But they eventually fell into the clutches of the evil swimsuit guardian Karenina.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And yet! A superhero is a superhero! She convinces the three guardians through the power of diplomacy and charisma!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: '【kuroname】 helped beg for our mercy.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'And then... the three swimsuit guardians even willingly gave up their control of summer, and gave the superhero a piece of land all to her own!', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'She meant we now have a place to play out our stories.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'And then and then, the guardians even agreed to pass this tale down!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Ayla found the story interesting and decided to adapt it into a holo-movie.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A splendid, happy ending! World peace, woohoo!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "This wouldn't have happened if you didn't doodle in the ruins that were supposed to be restored.", 4: '1'}
{3: "...I'm a bard! A bard has standards!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Watermelon popsicles, anyone? Oh, Commandant, you can't have it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The esteemed Bardami... No wait! What! Watermelon popsicles! Me-me-me-me, me!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'BREAKING!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'What is it this time?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Who needs peace anyway? "Lucia" decides to travel to the next world, and that\'s...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory176.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "I'm a happy-happy guard who gets to wear a kimono.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Queen', 3: 'Fair challenger, come you to this Schrodingerian dreamscape too, to conquer this magical castle?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Azure Weather Rhapsody: Phantasmagoria of Eastern Castle!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'COMING! NEVER! Oh, I mean—COMING! NEXT! YEAR! MAYBE! PROBABLY!', 4: '1'}
